website_summaries.verdict: A premium car wash kit that includes a wheel brush cleaner with handle, a chenille microfiber car wash sponge and other car wash must-haves.
pros: Boasts first-rate tools for cleaning a car's interior and exterior
Each tool is designed to help you clean your car's windshield, hood, doors, windows, back windshield, wheels and more
Microfiber material will not leave any fragments after cleaning
cons: Kit's window water scraper tends to bend a lot
Wheel brush is less than ideal

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Cheap tools, but generally workable except for squeegee. Some hold a lot of water and the bag should have some net so they don't fester when stored, but it looks like the bag was intended for an emergency kit, not a car washing one. You really don't need a safety triangle on a car wash kit until you are totally obsessed with your cars finish with traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the air vent brush, works great, but it’s a pain in the butt to put back on when it falls off. The kit will come in handy when I’m cleaning the car during the warmer months.
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Elle

customer_reviews.title: everything is decent but the silicone blade. It a ...
customer_reviews.text: everything is decent but the silicone blade. It a flat blade without a 'T' section on the end to wipe water at any angle...so you have to use it from a mostly vert angle only
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: Greater starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for your first car. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is the wheel brush didn't work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good products included. Great for beginners. My boyfriend has so many car cleaning supplies but tends to need new necessities like these more quickly than other things so I got him this and they’ve lasted great and really make his cleaning time shorter!
customer_reviews.author: Amber21

customer_reviews.title: Bad Squeegee! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP and useless! Bought this for the inside of my car window. The plastic squeegee was bent so it left streaks. Totally defeated the purpose, making everything else basically irrelevant.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The squeegee was the main item I was after and it was a disappointment. Just a flimsy floppy piece of silicone rubber. It isn't stiff enough to squeegee water off the window. The other items seem to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Presley

customer_reviews.title: It's dope !
customer_reviews.text: These are just cheap and great worth the value !!
customer_reviews.author: Plugz

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Was really nice but they forgot to include peices. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Alysha P.

customer_reviews.title: The product is handy
customer_reviews.text: Not bad product,just the tire scrub is not as thick as I imagined it to be .it is fine
customer_reviews.author: Fola

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: They work partially as intended but are made of extremely cheap materials the only really valuable items are the sponge, window cleaber and a/c cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Sarinana

customer_reviews.title: I should had try it first before I returned it but it was too late my deadline was overdue
customer_reviews.text: It didnt clean my car real good at left some residue on the windows and I'm not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Mitt started to fall apart after the first use.
customer_reviews.text: The washing mitt left blue bits on the car on first use, and when I looked at it when I was done washing the car it had also already started to come apart at the seams
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Zones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: fast ship - great product -nice bag - thank you
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The tire rim brush is great. Quality of the kit is good
customer_reviews.text: As described. The tire rim brush is great. Quality of the kit is good.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerHome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, everything you need. Small sizes, but all you really need.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Window water scraper is really bad!
customer_reviews.text: What I like - Nice set (regarding the amount of products you get for the price) What I don't like - Quality is not great - The window water scraper is really bad! it bends a lot and doesn't do the job (basically I have to buy another one) Click the button if this review helped you at all
customer_reviews.author: E&J
